channel.title: EBPF on Donia Chaiehloudj
channel.description: Recent content in EBPF on Donia Chaiehloudj

item.title: eBPF Hookpoint Gotchas: Why Your Program Fires (or Fails) in Unexpected Ways
item.description: Deep dive into eBPF hookpoints - kprobes/fentry, tracepoints, and uprobes - exposing internal kernel mechanics that cause surprising edge cases.

item.title: eBPF Hookpoint Gotchas
item.description: Episode 203 of eCHO where we discuss eBPF hookpoint gotchas and common pitfalls when working with eBPF programs.

item.title: eBPF Summit Hackathon Edition
item.description: Episode 199 where Liz Rice and I reveal the winners of the eBPF Summit Hackathon and discuss submission highlights with special guests.

item.title: Aladdin & the eBPF Lamp: Travel in the Kernel
item.description: A magical journey into the Linux kernel with eBPF - discovering the power of kernel observability and networking.

item.title: Benchmarks Don't Lie: The Real Cost of Security Agents
item.description: Episode 193 where I host Henrik Rexed to discuss his benchmarks on runtime security agents and the real cost of eBPF-based security solutions.

item.title: eBPF with Go: The Foundation of Modern Kubernetes Networking
item.description: Demystifying eBPF by exploring how Go makes it accessible, with practical demos of tracing, XDP packet filtering, and Cilium networking.

item.title: An Intro to eBPF with Go: The Foundation of Modern Kubernetes Networking
item.description: Demystifying eBPF by exploring how Go makes it accessible - with practical demos of tracing, XDP packet filtering, and Cilium networking.

item.title: Je vois des Gophers partout
item.description: Épisode 12 du podcast Tranches de Tech où je discute de Go, TinyGo, mon livre Manning, eBPF, Cilium, Docker et les conférences tech.

item.title: eBPF and Go: The Core of Modern Kubernetes Networking
item.description: Exploring how eBPF and Cilium are revolutionising Kubernetes networking - improving observability, security, and scalability.

item.title: Sécurise ton réseau avec la magie d'eBPF
item.description: Comment utiliser eBPF pour sécuriser les réseaux - filtrage, monitoring et protection de l’infrastructure.
